key_risks: Labor practices and legal issues, including lawsuits related to employee attrition rates and workplace conditions
Client concentration risk with significant revenue dependency on a few large clients
Geopolitical and operational risks due to operations in multiple countries
Competitive pressures in the BPO industry
AI and automation disruption potentially reducing demand for outsourced services
social_issues: Reliance on low-cost labor markets raising ethical concerns
Employee welfare and transparency issues highlighted in lawsuits
governance_issues: Scrutiny over labor practices and transparency in employee-related disclosures

sources.title: MARTIN AYALA VS TASKUS, INC. - UniCourt
sources.snippet: On 01/03/2019 MARTIN AYALA filed a Labor - Other Labor lawsuit against TASKUS, INC. This case was filed in Los Angeles County Superior Courts, Santa Monica Courthouse located in Los Angeles, California. The Judges overseeing this case are ROBERT B. BROADBELT and SAMANTHA JESSNER. The case status is Other.
